title: Jack Higgins-Edge of Danger
description: In Edge of Danger, this master of suspense crafts a sharp-edged tale of revenge. The Rashids are a powerful Arab family who pride themselves on financial success and an international reputation. So when they are sidestepped in critical oil-drilling negotiations, they swear an oath of vengeance against the one they hold responsible.
